blade-art.label: Blade Art
blade-art.description:
Blade Arts are special abilities unique to Mystic Knights. A Blade Art can only be performed once before needing to be Recharge.

You can Recharge all of your Blade Arts by spending 10 minutes doing the Refocus Activity.
